course.subject: BMED
course.name: Special Project: Global Health Technology
course.description: This is a “real world” medical device development project addressing the global health issues in the developing countries. The goal of this course is to develop students’ communication, interpersonal, teamwork, analytical, design and project management skills through a team-based design experience. Students are supervised by two faculty members to work on a project which is required to generate some medical product ideas in solving the global health problems. An overseas field trip, tutorials, biweekly meetings with supervisors, a project proposal, a final report and presentations are required in this project. Instructor’s approval is required for enrollment in the course.
